name: The Ritz-Carlton Beijing Financial Street

reviews.text: 5 stars standard, Beautiful hotel outside and inside, located next to the LaneCrawford shopping mall. The staff were friendly and professional. Tried their prize winning Italian restaurant and the lobby tea cafe, both were great.
reviews.title: Great Pool

reviews.text: The bed are soft and comfortable, one of the best compare to other 5 stars hotel. Bathroom is huge and have a small TV installed. The only issue was water easily split out of the shower room, most of the time the floor are halfway wet.
reviews.title: Nice for Beijing but Hotel did not escape effects of Pollution

reviews.text: My friend recevied a hand written birthday card and a presnet suprisingly on his bday, we were not expecting that and that was very touching.
reviews.title: Great place to stay, excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool was fantastic and wonderful. Indoor, warm water, even had a overhead projected screen. However there was no life guard so someone may think that was not that safe. Towels were ready for you but be reminded about feet pool at the entrance, I accidentally step into the pool with the wool slippers and they were soaked with water for whole night!
reviews.title: Fantastic stay at the Ritz Carlton

likes.liked: — Service of staff/cleanliness of the rooms and facilities

reviews.title: Wow, luxurious
reviews.text: Ordered the in room breakfast but not as great as the one in Westin Financial Street. The room service food were good though, we had a burger, pizza and fruit plate and drinks.

reviews.title: Friendly luxury
reviews.text: THIS hotel has been open less than a year in newly developing part of the city . It's not exactly in the thick of things but soon will be. Anyway, we loved it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you've ever stayed in an RC property you'll know what to expect but, for us, the friendly and enthusiastic staff are what made it an excellent base in Beijing. Most of them are new to the hotel business, but they're so determined to get it right that they try especially hard.
reviews.title: Wow!!!!

reviews.text: We sampled all the hotel restaurants and they're excellent. The rooms are lovely, especially the bathrooms - the tubs are really comfy and you can even watch TV while you bathe.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: You'll probably take a taxi to the major sights but, given the low cost of taxi fares, it's no great hardship. At night, it's not too far from the back lakes area, which is a great place to enjoy a drink or a meal.
reviews.title: A Nice Stay

reviews.text: I just wrote a not so great review of the Ritz in Shanghai. Now, I am going to RAVE about this Ritz. It is NEW, NEW, NEW! So, everything is in wonderful shape. The decor is hip and luxurious. Views are incredible. Pool is amazing, beautiful with incredible lighting and a huge projection screen at one end that plays vingate movies! Service fantastic. I can't say enough about beautiful decor, cleanliness.
reviews.title: One day was enough!

likes.liked: — bathroom was great. And pool was unique and grand.
likes.disliked: — I think it just opened, so it had many growing pains.

reviews.title: Top Hotel
reviews.text: One of the best hotels I have stayed in. Very friendly and well organised. The lights in the room took a bit of working out - especially the downlights which take a while to turn on - leaving you pressing the button again and again wondering why it does not work!

Next to the hotel is a fashionable (and always empty) shopping centre. The food in the hotel is good without being great, but there are also places nearby (Japanese, Italian, American and of course Chinese).
reviews.title: First Class

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located in one of the financial districts of Beijing away from most of the tourist spots - but the distance to Tianamen square is quite walkable.
reviews.title: Great hotel

likes.disliked: — Loved everything; this hotel is impeccable!

reviews.text: One thing though - there was a smell (like a sewer) in the lobby bar seating area that was quite unpleasant - but a minor point for this hotel.
reviews.title: Loved Ritz Beijing!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place is great.
reviews.title: One of the Best Ritz Carlton's in the world

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for two night on my first trip to Beijing in May 2008.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is brand new and the rooms are spectacular.
reviews.title: Probably the best in BJ

reviews.text: I stayed on the club floor and enjoyed a few of the five presentations they have daily.
reviews.title: Complete luxury in the heart of a busy city

reviews.text: If you can book through AMEX in order to get the fine hotel and resort program amenities.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay at the Ritz!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The indoor pool is nice and the spa looked great but didn't have time to get a massage.
reviews.title: Probably the best hotel in Beijing

likes.disliked: — Location - financial district is a very empty area four tourists
